channel.title: Space Anthem - Project Cancled :(
channel.description:
[s]Space Anthem is going to be a 2D, side-scrolling, bullet-hell, shoot-em up game. I got the idea for this a little earlier today from a buddy of mine. It is going to be HTML5 so it will be playable on multiple devices.[/s]
Not Started - Started - Finished
[b][s]Features[/s][/b]
[ul][li][s]Graphics[/s][/li] [li][s]Scrolling Background[/s][/li] [li][s]Sounds[/s][/li] [li][s]Physics[/s][/li] [li][s]Shooting[/s][/li] [li][s]Collision Checking[/s][/li] [li][s]Lives[/s][/li] [li][s]Scoring[/s][/li] [li][s]Highscores[/s][/li] [li][s]Player Movement[/s][/li] [li][s]Enemies[/s][/li] [li][s]Waves[/s][/li] [li][s]Boss Battle[/s][/li] [li][s]Powerups[/s][/li] [li]](Possibly) Multiplayer[/s][/li][/ul]
[b][s]Will be adding more features as they come along...[/s][/b]
[s]Here is the first completed graphic: [/s][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/20/ivbz.png[/img][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rIO4y0DBefU&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube]
[s]Scrolling Background Update:[/s]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BRL_yXUv2nE&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/9xPEZoP18G8[/youtube]
[b][s]January 25, 2014[/s][/b] [s]Just a little update today so far. I edited some of the images making it match and look a little cleaner and also added a third background layer giving it a nice depth (you can see this better with gameplay in next video). Here is a screenshot:[/s]
[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/36/yjnm.png[/img][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FIMfAPB9Bq4&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube]
[b][s]January 26, 2014[/s][/b] [s]I have added two types of enemies now. The first is more of an obstacle being an asteroid that moves between 3 random speeds, and the second is an enemy that fires bullets. For testing reasons I still have it to where the enemies do no damage to the player ship. [/s] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUUG0A5fyWI&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube][/s]
[B]I HAVE DECIDED TO CANLE THIS PROJECT DUE TO A NEW IDEA WHICH SEEMS TO BE OF MORE INTEREST TO ME[/B]

item.title: Space Anthem - Project Cancled :(
item.dc:creator: @Jordan_Hunt Jordan Hunt
item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

Ok I made the changes. Thanks for the suggestion. I also added the last update of the night: player movement and some basic collision detection.

EDIT: Jan 25, 2014
Added some changes and updated the OP.

Read full topic

item.title: Space Anthem - Project Cancled :(
item.dc:creator: @Jordan_Hunt Jordan Hunt
item.description:
@Jordan_Hunt wrote:

Space Anthem is going to be a 2D, side-scrolling, bullet-hell, shoot-em up game. I got the idea for this a little earlier today from a buddy of mine. It is going to be HTML5 so it will be playable on multiple devices.

Not Started - Started - Finished

Features

[ul][li]Graphics[/li]
[li]Scrolling Background[/li]
[li]Sounds[/li]
[li]Physics[/li]
[li]Shooting[/li]
[li]Collision Checking[/li]
[li]Lives[/li]
[li]Scoring[/li]
[li]Highscores[/li]
[li]Player Movement[/li]
[li]Enemies[/li]
[li]Waves[/li]
[li]Boss Battle[/li]
[li]Powerups[/li]
[li]](Possibly) Multiplayer[/s][/li][/ul]

Will be adding more features as they come along…

Here is the first completed graphic:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rIO4y0DBefU&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube]

Scrolling Background Update:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BRL_yXUv2nE&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/9xPEZoP18G8[/youtube]

January 25, 2014
Just a little update today so far. I edited some of the images making it match and look a little cleaner and also added a third background layer giving it a nice depth (you can see this better with gameplay in next video). Here is a screenshot:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FIMfAPB9Bq4&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube]

January 26, 2014
I have added two types of enemies now. The first is more of an obstacle being an asteroid that moves between 3 random speeds, and the second is an enemy that fires bullets. For testing reasons I still have it to where the enemies do no damage to the player ship.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUUG0A5fyWI&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube][/s]

[B]I HAVE DECIDED TO CANLE THIS PROJECT DUE TO A NEW IDEA WHICH SEEMS TO BE OF MORE INTEREST TO ME[/B]

Read full topic
